description:
Kurosaki rushes in to stop Kaito, who is facing down the Academy troops alone, but Kaito shakes off his offer of help, and bares his fangs at him...!! Having failed in his Duel with Yuuya, Kaito`s heart drowns in rage... Kurosaki once felt the same way. Now, to free Kaito`s heart, he stands against him, as though to strike Kaito with his own emotions. What will Kurosaki do...?!
Source: crunchyroll
